TowerDefense
Class Tower

java.lang.Object
  Shape2DLocatable
      TowerDefense.Tower

public class Tower
extends Shape2DLocatable

A tower is any stationary object inside the Tower Defense game. The basic tower has a simple gun and a range of 2 cells.
